story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_0300_10:
Remember that idea you gave me for
upgrading Poryphones?
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Everyone here helped me test it, and
we were able to collect more data
than ever!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_0500_10: I was just thinking I should thank you!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_0600_10: Glad to be of service, Mr. Jacq!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I’d love to be able to draw out the
power of sync stones ultimate too,
to help you in your research.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_0800_10: Just like Cynthia and the others!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_0900_10:
You mean you wish to awaken your
arc suit too?
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1100_10:
Actually, I wanted to ask you something
about that, Cynthia!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1200_10: Would you battle me in the Arceus Cup?
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1300_10: You want to redeem yourself, I presume.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1400_10: Very well! I accept your challenge!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1500_10:
I see! So now it’s your turn to awaken
your arc suit, Volo!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I’ll be cheering you on this time! I know
you can do it!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’ll be cheering for you as well.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1800_10:
It was thanks to your keen questions I
was able to reaffirm my bond with my
partner Pokémon and attain my arc suit.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Why, thank you! That’s comforting to
hear! I’ll be sure to give it my all!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Why do you wish to awaken your
arc suit?
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2200_10:
It doesn’t seem just out of interest in
research or beating Cynthia.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2300_10:
You seem to have strong feelings
about it.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2400_10:
Hahaha! Can’t get anything past you,
can I.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2500_10:
I’ve been fascinated with myths a long
time—and studied them on my own.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Through my studies, I learned of a
Pokémon named Arceus.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2700_10:
That piqued my curiosity—and sparked
a desire to unravel the secrets of the
world!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2800_10: I’ve spent my entire life pursuing Arceus.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_2900_10:
I simply wish for its eminence to
acknowledge me.
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Very well. Then I’ll also be cheering for
you in the Arceus Cup!
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_3300_10: (I didn’t get the sense he was lying...)
story_arceus_06_06000/2401_1001_3400_10: (So why does my heart feel uneasy?)
